-----------------------------------------------
	UnInstall Package
----------------------------------------------
	To UnInstall the package and remove dependencies run the following command:
	
	UnInstall-Package Check_My_Box_Package -RemoveDependencies
	
	This will remove all package information and dependencies
---------------------------------------------
      EntityFramework 
---------------------------------------------

	This will install code first

---------------------------------------------
       Glimpse     
---------------------------------------------
	Using the Trace classes to set all information
	I can turn Glimpse on with a Bookmarklet, but I like visiting 
		http://localhost:portname/Glimpse/Config and pressing the big "Turn Glimpse On" button
---------------------------------------------
       MVCScaffolding     
---------------------------------------------
		Scaffold Controller UserArea -Area DBManagement
		Scaffold Controller User -Area Services -ModelType NoStressWedding.Areas.DBManagement.Models.User
